Fey whimsy or a tryst in a moonlit grove put the bewitching magic of the First World into your family's bloodline.

Spell List primal

Bloodline Skills Deception, Nature

Granted Spells cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ghost Sound]{Ghost Sound}, 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Charm]{Charm}, 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Hideous Laughter]{Hideous Laughter}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Enthrall]{Enthrall}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Suggestion]{Suggestion}, 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Cloak of Colors]{Cloak of Colors}, 6th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mislead]{Mislead}, 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Visions of Danger]{Visions of Danger}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Uncontrollable Dance]{Uncontrollable Dance}, 9th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Resplendent Mansion]{Resplendent Mansion}

Bloodline Spells initial: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Faerie Dust]{Faerie Dust}, advanced: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fey Disappearance]{Fey Disappearance}, greater: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fey Glamour]{Fey Glamour}

Blood Magic Colorful fey glamours dance around you or one target, causing them to be concealed for 1 round. Such obvious concealment can't be used to Hide.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Fey Blood Magic]{Effect: Fey Blood Magic}
